bibl.title: Invitation, Milton Weaver to Charles C. Dodson, William Hoffman, and John McCarter
bibl.note: In this document, Milton Weaver invites his friends Charles Dodson, William Hoffman, and John McCarter to a party at the home of Evins Waymire. At the time this document was created, all four men were serving with Company F of the 74th Ohio Volunteer Infantry. The unit was on veterans' furlough in Ohio from 25 January 1864 to 12 April 1864, and since all four men were natives of Butler, Ohio, it is likely that the party was held in that town.
